body:
Hey guys! JJ here, and I am here with a new... Discussion. In english, we are currently writing about debatable topics, so i decided to come here, and talk about some with you guys! Every Wednesday, I'll post a new Topic, and you can all put your opinion in.

First Off:
Do violent video games contribute to violent kids?
body_tagged:
Hey guys! JJ here, and I am here with a new... Discussion. In english, we are currently writing about debatable topics, so i decided to come here, and talk about some with you guys! Every Wednesday, I'll post a new Topic, and you can all put your opinion in.

First Off:
Do violent video games contribute to violent kids?
title: ** JJ's Debatable Topics #1**

replies.body: No. I don't see a rise in crime after every GTA game.
replies.body_tagged: No. I don't see a rise in crime after every GTA game.

replies.body: Well, little kids are commonly influenced by video games, and I am sure that gun games are absolutley not healthy for them. However, Older and more mature players do not necessarily have to be 18 to understand that the games should not be replicated in real life. I think that violent video games will affect kids only if they are mentally ill and/or they too small and easy to pick up bad habits.
replies.body_tagged: Well, little kids are commonly influenced by video games, and I am sure that gun games are absolutley not healthy for them. However, Older and more mature players do not necessarily have to be 18 to understand that the games should not be replicated in real life. I think that violent video games will affect kids only if they are mentally ill and/or they too small and easy to pick up bad habits.

replies.body: No, this is different. That's a rant page about things TnT finds wring, or bad. This is a page about topics that are contraversial, and two sided. Everyone gets to put their input here, and we all talk, bounce ideas, ect. Kind of like a Socratic Seminar.

A minecraft pvp server.

A game where you fight and kill other players. 

So it's actually quite related to Avicus.
